## Role type

Roles are used to handle permissions on modules that extend [ModuleWithRoles](./sdk.modulewithroles.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Role = keyof IRoles;
```

<b>References:</b> [IRoles](./sdk.iroles.md)
